titles.title: To clear certain impediments to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

bill.summary: 8/4/1995--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
